mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restbl(RESNUM,RESNAME,RESBIRTH,RESPHONE,RESDATE,RESTIME,RESMEMBER,PAYMENTS,RESCOMMENTS,CAFEPHONE) VALUES((SELECT nextval('resseq') FROM DUAL), #{resName},#{resBirth},#{resPhone},#{resDate},#{resTime},#{resMember},#{payMents},#{resComments},#{cafePhone})
mapper.select: select * from restbl order by RESNUM
